\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hangings|strong="H7050"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w were|strong="H5439"\w* woven \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w twisted|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*.
